assignments.description: Adds the case to the collection to send an email and update a Date field
assignments.name: AddCaseToCollectionUseCase
assignments.label: AddCaseToCollectionUseCase

assignments.description: Assigns a Date Today() to the “Sent Closing Reminder” Date field on the Case.
assignments.name: AssignClosingReminderDate
assignments.label: AssignClosingReminderDate

assignments.description: Assigns a Date Today() to the “Sent Follow Up 1” Date field on the Case.
assignments.name: AssignSentFollowUp1Date
assignments.label: AssignSentFollowUp1Date

assignments.description: Assigns a Date Today() to the “Sent Follow Up 2” Date field on the Case.
assignments.name: AssignSentFollowUp2Date
assignments.label: AssignSentFollowUp2Date

assignments.description: Assigns a Date Today() to the “Sent Solution Adoption Reminder” Date field on the Case.
assignments.name: AssignSentSolutionAdoptionReminderDate
assignments.label: AssignSentSolutionAdoptionReminderDate

assignments.description: Assigns a Date Today() to the “Sent Welcome Email” Date field on the Case.
assignments.name: AssignSentWelcomeDate
assignments.label: AssignSentWelcomeDate

assignments.description: Assigns a Date Today() to the “Sent Support Handover” Date field on the Case.
assignments.name: AssignSupportHandoverDate
assignments.label: AssignSupportHandoverDate

assignments.description: Counts the number of Cases that were added from the Loop. The number should match the number of records the user chose from the List View.
assignments.name: CountChosenCases
assignments.label: CountChosenCases

assignments.description: Counts the number of Ids from the list view
assignments.name: CountIDsFromListView
assignments.label: CountIDsFromListView

assignments.description: Counts the number of records to be updated
assignments.name: CountOfUpdateCases
assignments.label: CountOfUpdateCases

decisions.description: Decides if the current case in the loop is a Case chosen by the user from the list view
decisions.name: CaseIdInCollectionDecision
decisions.label: CaseIdInCollectionDecision

decisions.description: Decides which product line the Case has to determine which product’s Closing Reminder email to send
decisions.name: ClosingReminderProductLineDecision
decisions.label: ClosingReminderProductLineDecision

decisions.description: Decides what type of email the user has chosen to send out based on their choice from screen 1
decisions.name: EmailTypeDecision
decisions.label: EmailTypeDecision

decisions.description: Decides which product line the Case has to determine which product’s Follow Up 1 email to send
decisions.name: FollowUp1ProductLineDecision
decisions.label: FollowUp1ProductLineDecision

decisions.description: Decides which product line the Case has to determine which product’s Follow Up 2 email to send
decisions.name: FollowUp2ProductLineDecision
decisions.label: FollowUp2ProductLineDecision

decisions.description: Decides which product line the Case has to determine which product’s Solution Adoption Reminder email to send
decisions.name: SAReminderProductLineDecision
decisions.label: SAReminderProductLineDecision

decisions.description: Decides which product line the Case has to determine which product’s SupportHandover email to send
decisions.name: SupportHandoverProductLineDecision
decisions.label: SupportHandoverProductLineDecision

decisions.description: Decides which product line the Case has to determine which product’s welcome email to send
decisions.name: WelcomeProductLineDecision
decisions.label: WelcomeProductLineDecision

Flow.description: NICC-060541; Screen Flow to send email alerts for Solution Adoption Cases. Replaces an existing process builder and Flow with the same name.

formulas.description: Calculates the number of records that did not get updated
formulas.name: formulaNumberOfRecordsNotUpdated

Flow.interviewLabel: Case - Solution Adoption Email Alerts v2.0 {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Case - Solution Adoption Email Alerts v2.0

loops.description: Loops through all open Solution Adoption cases to find the Cases the user selected from the List view
loops.name: LoopAllCases
loops.label: LoopAllCases

loops.description: Loops through chosen Cases to send an email alert and update a “Sent...” date field
loops.name: LoopChosenCases
loops.label: LoopChosenCases

recordLookups.description: Gets a list of all Solution Adoption Cases where the Status of the Case is not Closed
recordLookups.name: GetCases
recordLookups.label: GetCases

recordUpdates.description: Updates the “Sent...” Date on the Case
recordUpdates.name: UpdateCaseSentDate
recordUpdates.label: UpdateCaseSentDate

fields.name: EmailSendTypeScreenInput
fields.fieldText: What type of email do you want to send?

fields.name: SampleYourFlowIsDone
fields.fieldText:
our Flow is done and emails have been sent.


-Number of records from List View: {!varCountOfRecordsFromListView}


﻿-Number of Emails Sent: {!varCountOfEmailsSent}


-Number of Case Record "Sent..." Dates updated: {!varCountOfUpdateCases}


-Number of Records not updated: {!formulaNumberOfRecordsNotUpdated}

variables.description: Stores a collection of open Solution Adoption Cases
variables.name: AllSolutionAdoptionCasesCollection

variables.description: holds a list of Cases that did not receive an email and didn't get a Date field updates
variables.name: collectionCasesNoEmailOrDate1

variables.description: Holds the Ids of the records chosen from the List view the user used to launch this Flow
variables.name: ids

variables.description: holds a list of Cases that did not receive an email and didn't get a Date field updates
variables.name: varCasesNoEmailOrDate

variables.description: Holds the collection of Cases chosen by the user from the List view
variables.name: varChosenCaseRecordsCollection

variables.description: Holds a count of the number of cases found when looping through Cases Ids
variables.name: varCountOfChosenCases

variables.description: Holds a count of the number of emails sent out through the Flow
variables.name: varCountOfEmailsSent

variables.description: Counts the number of Ids sent through the list view into the Flow
variables.name: varCountOfRecordsFromListView

variables.description: Counts the number of records to be updated
variables.name: varCountOfUpdateCases

variables.description: Holds the collection of records to update a "Sent..." Date field
variables.name: varFinalCaseUpdatesRecordCollection

variables.description: Holds the temporary record that will update one of the "Sent..." dates for Solution Adoption email alerts
variables.name: varUpdateCaseSentDate
